ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Player Opened Container
ResponseRule.description: Cargo Bay - Player has opened Igwe's cargo container, exposin him to the vacuum of space.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Warning: Don't Open My Container!
ResponseRule.description: Cargo Bay - Player has opened Igwe's cargo container, exposing him to the vacuum of space.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Distress Call from Cargo Container
ResponseRule.description: An accident ruptured the Cargo Bay, exposing it to space. Dr. Igwe avoided death by jumping into a space cargo container and sealing it shut. Dr. Igwe makes contact with a TranScribe (the player's) as it passes near his container.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Dying In Cargo Container
ResponseRule.description: Dr. Igwe: If Dr. Igwe dies in the crate he records his final words on his TranScribe.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Morgan Is Banging On Igwe's Cargo Container -- 1st Time
ResponseRule.description: Player is banging on the side of Igwe's cargo container.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Morgan Is Banging On Igwe's Cargo Container -- Followups
ResponseRule.description: Player is banging on the side of Igwe's cargo container.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe Crate Docked
ResponseRule.description: Player docked Igwe's cargo container with the station, saving Igwe.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Come to the Shuttle, Warning
ResponseRule.description: Time is running out. Igwe and others are waiting for the player to come to the Shuttle Bay to escape the station's destruction.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Found Dead Bodies In Cargo Bay
ResponseRule.description: If Igwe somehow manages to walk into the death scene in Cargo Bay but hasn't spoken to the player he'll call the player later and report what he's found.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Dahl Operators Attacking Office
ResponseRule.description: While the player is away Dahl's Operators have tried to invade Morgan's office.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Get Some Things From My Room
ResponseRule.description: Igwe, when he detects Morgan approaching the Crew Quarters, preferably in a down moment (no Luka and no other pressure), he builds up the courage to ask Morgan to retrieve his memorabilia.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Morgan Grabbed Connectomes
ResponseRule.description: Igwe comments when the player has found the neural data (connectomes) of the pianist, Leitner, and other celebs.

ResponseRule.name: Concerto Snippet
ResponseRule.description: This is a short piece of music by the pianist Gustav Leitner, that when played in Igwe's room, opens a safe.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Deep Storage, Warn Morgan
ResponseRule.description: Igwe (via a quiet call) warns Morgan of what's contained on the evidence Mikhaila asked for (evidence that Morgan himself likely killed her father in an experiment).

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Dahl Operators Attacking Office -- Final Warning
ResponseRule.description: While the player is away Dahl's Operators have tried to invade Morgan's office. Final warning.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Don't Kill Dahl
ResponseRule.description: Igwe has a plan to strip out Dahl's nueromods. He wants Morgan to avoid killing him if possible. Igwe asks the player to knock him out and take his body to a special 'transport tube.' Player can put unconcious Dahl into a cargo cannister. Then, Igwe will send an Engineering Operator to scoop him up.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Don't Kill Dahl -- Short Version
ResponseRule.description: Igwe has a plan to strip out Dahl's neuromods. He wants Morgan to avoid killing him if possible. Igwe asks the player to head up to the office so he can explain.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Player Subdued Dahl
ResponseRule.description: Igwe contacts with a followup for what to do with Dahl's unconsious body.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Player Subdued Dahl -- No Medical Bay
ResponseRule.description: Igwe contacts with a followup for what to do with Dahl's unconsious body. In this case, no action necessary. A medical operator is coming to pick it up.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Dahl Died After Being Subdued
ResponseRule.description: Dahl died anyway. Igwe is sad.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Dahl Has Been Collected
ResponseRule.description: Igwe recovered Dahl's body and summons Morgan to meet him in the Neuromod Division.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Dahl Has Been Collected Reminder
ResponseRule.description: Igwe recovered Dahl's body and summons Morgan to meet him in the Neuromod Division. Reminder to hurry because time is running out.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Igwe Stranded. Player Used Alex's Escape POD
ResponseRule.description: Player left on Alex's Secret Escape POD. Igwe is stranded. Station goes boom.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe + January. Player Used Alex's Escape POD
ResponseRule.description: Player left on Alex's Secret Escape POD. Igwe is left w/ January. Station goes boom.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Leaves aboard Alex's Escape POD
ResponseRule.description: Player made Igwe leave aboard Alex's Escape POD. Not a live option. Keeping this just in case.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Come to the Shuttle
ResponseRule.description: Igwe has just arrived at the shuttle with everyone and is ready to go.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Shuttle Farewell, Morgan Staying On Station
ResponseRule.description: Igwe's final goodbye as the shuttle is leaving without the player.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Shuttle Farewell, Morgan Has Escape Pod
ResponseRule.description: Igwe's final goodbye as the shuttle is leaving without the player.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Player Killed Dahl
ResponseRule.description: Player took Dahl out.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Igwe Detonates January
ResponseRule.description: Igwe remote kills January in the event that it is preventing Morgan from using the terminal in bridge to trigger the Null Wave.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Trapped, Igwe Tries to Persuade Not to Blow It All Up
ResponseRule.description: Igwe reacts to leaning that Morgan wants to blow up the station. This could possibly play after hearing a January line or TS. Or if the player replays his video while Igwe is in the office. Also, Igwe has no way off the station.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Trapped. Tries to Sabotage January's Plan.
ResponseRule.description: No idea when this would play. *** Avellone Note: See if still necessary? ***

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Trapped. Final Farewell. Station Destruction
ResponseRule.description: Igwe sends his last mesasge before everything blows.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Reached Morgan's Office Alone
ResponseRule.description: Igwe is letting the player know he reached his office. January and Mikhaila are absent.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Reached Morgan's Office + January
ResponseRule.description: Igwe is letting the player know he reached his office. January is present. Mikhaila is absent.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Reached Morgan's Office + Mikhaila
ResponseRule.description: Igwe is letting the player know he reached his office. January is absent. Mikhaila is present.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Reached Morgan's Office + January + Mikhaila
ResponseRule.description: Igwe is letting the player know he reached his office. January and Mikhaila are present.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Reached Morgan's Office, January Dead
ResponseRule.description: Igwe is letting the player know he reached his office. He finds January, a robot, destroyed on the floor (he has no idea how it died).

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Reached Morgan's Office, Mikhaila Dead
ResponseRule.description: Igwe is letting the player know he reached his office. He finds Mikhaila, the Chief Engineer, dead on the floor (he has no idea how she died - he bore her no ill will, but he was not strongly tied to her, either).

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Reached Morgan's Office, January and Mikhaila Dead
ResponseRule.description: Igwe has reached Morgan's Office and found both January destroyed and Mikhaila dead on the floor. He has no idea how they died.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Calling from Morgan's Office, Generic Items Ready for Pick-Up
ResponseRule.description: Generic items are ready from Dr. Igwe, calling Morgan to let him know they are ready for pick up from Morgan's office.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Calling in from Morgan's Office, Chipset Ready for Pick-Up
ResponseRule.description: Dr. Igwe, calling Morgan to let him know the chipset is ready for pick up from Morgan's office. The chipset was mentioned previously (not sure how the first one is fired, so adding this and the next rule for safety).

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Calling in from Morgan's Office, Chipset Ready for Pick-Up
ResponseRule.description: Dr. Igwe, calling Morgan to let him know the chipset is ready for pick up from Morgan's office. Chipset not mentioned before (adding for safety).

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Player Subdued Dahl -- Second Convo
ResponseRule.description: Igwe contacts with a followup for what to do with Dahl's unconsious body.
